system.description:
Racial Traits

  • Desert elves can choose between Black Powder Proficiency or Personal Firearms Proficiency, at 1st level for free
  • Desert elves possess Blindsight, which allows them to fight in total lack of visibility, either through environment or lack of sight. This ability has a 35’ range.

Racial Traits (Active Effect)

  • Desert elves are Medium sized creatures.
  • Desert elves receive a −2 Racial Recoil Penalty to recoil when using any weapon that has recoil.

Physical Description

A healthy desert elf typically stands between 4½’-5½’, and weighs between 120-160 lbs. The men are usually taller than the women. Elves have slightly pointed ears, that they often decorate with jewelry and piercings. Desert elven skin tone ranges from a light tan to a deep dark tone, and their hair ranges from light brown to a black, usually in a long straight texture. The average elven lifespan is 160 years, reaching physical adulthood between the ages of 20-27.

Language

The native language of a desert elf is Haramut.

Names

Desert elves usually keep a multitude of names. They have a given name, as well as a notated name that they usually give out to strangers and associates. They only give their true given name to those they trust.
